{"step_by_step_thinking": "Axonal transport refers to the movement of materials along the axon of a neuron. It can occur in two directions: antegrade and retrograde. Antegrade transport refers to the movement of materials from the cell body towards the axon terminal, while retrograde transport refers to the movement of materials from the axon terminal towards the cell body. Therefore, the correct answer is C. Antegrade and retrograde.", "answer_choice": "C"}
